name: Blob Lander
description:
This is a very interesting game, you need to control the safe landing of the spacecraft to the destination, together to challenge it!
Actually this is a challenge game. The goal of Blob Lander is to fly and land your spaceship gracefully.


How to start
When the game is loaded, click Play Game and start the game

The game goal
←→↑↓ Control the spacecraft to avoid obstacles and safely stop at the designated position to pass the border!

The game is introduced
A very interesting game, you need to control the red panda or pig driving the spacecraft safely landed to the destination, together to challenge it!
